name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of polished silver and has a small red gem embedded in the center.

special_effects.mighty: Increases damage dealt with melee attacks.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A bow infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The bow has a sleek design with a golden frame and silver strings. It glows with a faint magical aura.

special_effects.enchanted_arrows: Enhances the damage and effects of arrows shot with this bow.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is capable of restoring life energy.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings and a crystal orb at the top. It emits a soft glow that changes color depending on its current healing energy.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the caster, increasing the effectiveness of healing spells.

name: Dagger of Poison
description: A small dagger coated with a deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a sleek design with a razor-sharp blade. The handle is wrapped in black leather, giving it a mysterious look.

special_effects.poison_attack: Has a chance to poison the target, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that can heal wounds and restore health.
looks: The wand has a smooth wooden handle with a crystal at the top that emits a soft, healing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Each successful hit with the wand restores a small amount of hp.
